title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not work unless I first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I launch the Help view and press the tab key, nothing happens. It only starts working if I first click on one of the 'live' areas mentioned.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should work immediately without needing to click on any 'live' area.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Help view. 2. Press the tab key before clicking on any 'live' area. See that the tab key doesn't work. To get it to work, click on one of the 'live' areas first and then try pressing the tab key again.
